name: Dungeons of Blood and Dream
storyline: Following a horrific incident, a blood wizard ends up trapped on a strange island. To escape, he must follow cryptic guidance from mysterious locals and venture into perilous dungeons within his own sleeping mind in search for the cursed candles - artifacts necessary to conduct the grand portal opening ritual.
summary: Play as a mighty blood wizard on a quest to escape a death-loop of psychedelic dungeons. Slay disgusting creatures with a large array of bladed weapons and unnerving spells, harness the power of cursed rings, find mysterious treasures, and learn the secrets of the universe you are trapped in.
